snippet.title: Mini Z Racers Turbo - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Coolegion Studios' attempt at a Micro Machines clone that ended up with mostly negative reviews on Steam. (At least it's still a better racing game Strategy First published on Steam than the disastrous FlatOut 3: Chaos & Destruction, developed by the hacks at Team6 Studios)
Have a look at my review on InfiniteBacklog to see why I gave it a 5/10: https://infinitebacklog.nl/users/aklim95/reviews/mini-z-racers-turbo

Mini Z Racers Turbo (C) Coolegion Studios, Strategy First
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/508930/Mini_Z_Racers_Turbo/
